commit_message:
Add an error tip when trace_id is not found

If ceilometer doesn't enable profiler notification topic,
the trace_id would not be found as well.

Change-Id: I54a976498ae77380ecdce1b449ba70a9522ce692

subject: Reduce log errors from heka
revisions:
[{'number': 3, 'created': '2016-03-23 22:20:59.000000000', 'files': ['ansible/site.yml'], 'message': 'Reduce log errors from heka

Heka depends on haproxy and keepaived being present to communicate
with ElasticSearch.  If we start ElasticSearch prior to haproxy and
keepalived, the number of errors are reduced in heka.

Change-Id: Id2c742ea572c6450a371421e21f34aa69355bb8b
Partial-Bug: #1560779
'}]
commit_message:
Reduce log errors from heka

Heka depends on haproxy and keepaived being present to communicate
with ElasticSearch.  If we start ElasticSearch prior to haproxy and
keepalived, the number of errors are reduced in heka.

Change-Id: Id2c742ea572c6450a371421e21f34aa69355bb8b
Partial-Bug: #1560779

subject: Increase database connections to 10000
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2016-03-31 07:42:24.000000000', 'files': ['ansible/roles/mariadb/templates/galera.cnf.j2'], 'message': 'Increase database connections to 10000

Scale limit testing on a 64 node cluster with 13 TB RAM and 2600
cores showed that atleast 1800 database connections are required
to appropriately start 2000 virtual machines simulateounsly.  Other
documentation on the internet recommends larger values such as 8000,
so we set to a larger value that should be able to handle a maxed out
512GB ram per compute node cluster with all services enabled.

Change-Id: I8767cf3fb04e066cc22e796c647e944b4e4a1742
Closes-Bug: #1564275
'}]
commit_message:
Increase database connections to 10000

Scale limit testing on a 64 node cluster with 13 TB RAM and 2600
cores showed that atleast 1800 database connections are required
to appropriately start 2000 virtual machines simulateounsly.  Other
documentation on the internet recommends larger values such as 8000,
so we set to a larger value that should be able to handle a maxed out
512GB ram per compute node cluster with all services enabled.

Change-Id: I8767cf3fb04e066cc22e796c647e944b4e4a1742
Closes-Bug: #1564275

subject: Fix the nova reconfigure in the multinode env
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2016-03-30 09:03:23.000000000', 'files': ['ansible/roles/nova/tasks/do_reconfigure.yml'], 'message': "Fix the nova reconfigure in the multinode env

Checking the fix condition first in the when clause rather than the
dynamic condition. Otherwise it will raise issue, especially in
multinode env.

For example use

  when:
    - nova_console == 'novnc'
    - inventory_hostname in groups['nova-novncproxy']

rather than

  when:
    - inventory_hostname in groups['nova-novncproxy']
    - nova_console == 'novnc'

Because the nova-novncproxy groups may do not exist.

Change-Id: I1e76ee239908a17a4c2ffd9a18c570fbc485172e
Closes-Bug: #1563643
"}]
commit_message:
Fix the nova reconfigure in the multinode env

Checking the fix condition first in the when clause rather than the
dynamic condition. Otherwise it will raise issue, especially in
multinode env.

For example use

  when:
    - nova_console == 'novnc'
    - inventory_hostname in groups['nova-novncproxy']

rather than

  when:
    - inventory_hostname in groups['nova-novncproxy']
    - nova_console == 'novnc'

Because the nova-novncproxy groups may do not exist.

Change-Id: I1e76ee239908a17a4c2ffd9a18c570fbc485172e
Closes-Bug: #1563643

commit_message:
Ensure error exit codes fail integrations

The exit code of sub commands were ignored.  As a result all
integration jobs would pass even when they fail.

Change-Id: I071283d2737199ed710e246740f68f8e857027f2
Closes-Bug: #1546772

subject: Fix IP resolve check for RabbitMQ on AIO
revisions:
[{'number': 2, 'created': '2016-04-01 05:57:28.000000000', 'files': ['ansible/roles/rabbitmq/tasks/bootstrap.yml'], 'message': 'Fix IP resolve check for RabbitMQ on AIO

On AIO installation we cannot assume that the public IP address
will be the first entry in "getent ahostsv4" result, because
it may be also a localhost address. To make this check positive
in AIO, we should look for the public IP in the whole output.

Change-Id: I1da7b95d7f00c7f87ff68ead46bf55fdea812599
Closes-Bug: 1564564
'}]
commit_message:
Fix IP resolve check for RabbitMQ on AIO

On AIO installation we cannot assume that the public IP address
will be the first entry in "getent ahostsv4" result, because
it may be also a localhost address. To make this check positive
in AIO, we should look for the public IP in the whole output.

Change-Id: I1da7b95d7f00c7f87ff68ead46bf55fdea812599
Closes-Bug: 1564564

subject: [Reports] Hotfix for rendering tables in HTML report
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2016-04-01 08:24:30.000000000', 'files': ['rally/ui/templates/task/report.html'], 'message': '[Reports] Hotfix for rendering tables in HTML report

There is a bug appeared - tables in report are broken!

Angular directive "ui/templates/task/directive_widget.js"
is processed by Jinja2 so JavaScript becomes corrupted.

This change enables raw including, without any changes
in directive, so we have the bug fixed.

Change-Id: I2cf2e7fc6750bf96e2e3cb0c809ba339b543d89a
'}]
commit_message:
[Reports] Hotfix for rendering tables in HTML report

There is a bug appeared - tables in report are broken!

Angular directive "ui/templates/task/directive_widget.js"
is processed by Jinja2 so JavaScript becomes corrupted.

This change enables raw including, without any changes
in directive, so we have the bug fixed.

Change-Id: I2cf2e7fc6750bf96e2e3cb0c809ba339b543d89a

revisions:
[{'number': 4, 'created': '2016-04-01 06:51:09.000000000', 'files': ['openstackclient/network/v2/subnet_pool.py', 'openstackclient/tests/network/v2/test_subnet_pool.py'], 'message': 'Add default value to pool-prefix in Subnet-pool

If user tries to create a subnet pool without --pool-prefix,
it fails at the NeutronServer [1].
This patch tries to add a default value to the --pool-prefix
to try and resolve it.

Closes-Bug: #1564271
[1] : http://paste.openstack.org/show/492537/

Change-Id: I6cf324a5a8037048602e59c0bbfc93b40e73a74e
'}]
commit_message:
Add default value to pool-prefix in Subnet-pool

If user tries to create a subnet pool without --pool-prefix,
it fails at the NeutronServer [1].
This patch tries to add a default value to the --pool-prefix
to try and resolve it.

Closes-Bug: #1564271
[1] : http://paste.openstack.org/show/492537/

Change-Id: I6cf324a5a8037048602e59c0bbfc93b40e73a74e

subject: Log HttpError in destroy before converting
revisions:
[{'number': 1, 'created': '2016-04-01 14:27:54.000000000', 'files': ['nova_powervm/virt/powervm/driver.py'], 'message': "Log HttpError in destroy before converting

We're converting a pypowervm HttpError to a nova
InstanceTerminationFailure in the destroy flow, and losing the
HttpError's traceback as a result.  This change set adds a log of the
original exception to improve FFDC.

Change-Id: Ia0ba8226e2c128bc3433b7f179acb552469d997d
"}]
commit_message:
Log HttpError in destroy before converting

We're converting a pypowervm HttpError to a nova
InstanceTerminationFailure in the destroy flow, and losing the
HttpError's traceback as a result.  This change set adds a log of the
original exception to improve FFDC.

Change-Id: Ia0ba8226e2c128bc3433b7f179acb552469d997d
